document.full_text: entrepreneur zaid fadhel has spent $800,000 to realize a dream of reviving cinemas in iraq after decades of dictatorship that shut movie houses and fear of bombings that kept people at home.
document.title: iraq aims to revive movie-going stifled by saddam, war
lines_and_colors: entrepreneur zaid fadhel has spent $800,000 to realize a dream of reviving cinemas in iraq after decades of dictatorship that shut movie houses and fear of bombings that kept people at home.
